website_summaries.verdict: A large watch with multiple functions that an active kid will enjoy, though the water resistance doesn't always hold true.
pros: Many of the functions of an adult watch like alarm, stopwatch, dual time, date, and calendar
Strap and buckle can take heavy use
cons: Water resistance doesn't hold up for all units, even when the user doesn't push buttons while in the water

customer_reviews.title: Not water resistant at all..did not even lasta month
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my 10 yr old son. This watch claims to be water resistant well it was not. Did not even last a month. Recieved it on 03/15/19 and stop working on 04/10/19. My son went to
customer_reviews.author: Espy hurtado

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for the price
customer_reviews.text: My teenager loves this watch. Seems to tell accurate time. Color and style is very cool. Fits his slim wrist well. I am concerned that a few of the numbers are beginning to rub off with less than 2 months of continual wear, however. Hopefully, it will hold up. I'll update my post if things change. But, for now, it is a good watch for the price point that it is currently at.
customer_reviews.author: A.P.

customer_reviews.title: 2 strikes - you're out
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this watch for my son now twice. The first one constantly reset the time on it's own and then fell apart after a few months. We tried one more time because he really likes the look of it. Same thing on the second watch. Constant resetting of the time and then it fell apart.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Perkins

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Great watch for my 9 yr old until the face plate broke and wouldn’t snap back on.
customer_reviews.author: Mendy R.

customer_reviews.title: very good worth the price
customer_reviews.text: buy it for my sons birthday gift he likes it alot comes in good condition and it was fast would like to buy one again for gift next time
customer_reviews.author: godpain

customer_reviews.title: All around great watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for son and he loves it. He wears it everywhere even the shower. It seems pretty durable and he loves the backlight feature.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi1982

customer_reviews.title: Not water resistant
customer_reviews.text: My son got a splash of water on his watch from the hosepipe and now the entire screen is fogged up. Don't believe this watch's claims to be water resistant!
customer_reviews.author: J & M

customer_reviews.title: Broken and Broken Again
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 11 year old daughter. Her choice. While it is described as a kid's watch, it is actually a full adult size watch. Only the wrist band is short enough to call it a kid's watch. I think it's bulky, but my daughter still loved it. Unfortunately, the second hand was broken right out of the box. It came loose and just dangled there. We returned it for a replacement. That new watch worked fine for only two weeks. The second hand again fell off it's mount. With the exact same thing happening twice in a row, this is clearly a manufacturing defect. I would recommend shopping for a different manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK for kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son, he loves it. Personally I find it very hard to read as the face is very cluttered. Watch is bulky and hard to put over long sleeves.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: ) It looks and works great.
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old has very small wrists so it barely fits. But that isn't the watch's fault. :) It looks and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Piers Ikerd

customer_reviews.title: This watch is easy to read
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my son to teach him how to read a clock. It has a digital time as well. This watch is easy to read, easy to use and adjust, and looks great on. I recommend this watch for its value.
customer_reviews.author: Micah Pitts

customer_reviews.title: Kid Multifunction Watch
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 9 year old and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Seconds hand falls off!
customer_reviews.text: We've tried two of these watches, and both had same issue: Seconds hand were loose, and easily knocked off when watch was shaken, i.e. when my kid played basketball, or other sports, which delivered slight shock to the watch!
customer_reviews.author: Paul K.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great watch! My 10 year old loved it and wears it almost every day!
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son and he didn't like that it. I thought it was fine.

customer_reviews.title: Good watch
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son and he loves it, great watch
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Saucedo

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend buying
customer_reviews.text: The analogue arms stop working a week after my kid used it . And they block the digital clock view .. I do not recommend buying it

customer_reviews.title: we received thewatch last week
customer_reviews.text: we received this item and 1 week later the strap broke off, however the company turned around and sent us new ones! Wonderful!

customer_reviews.title: ... set the time to the current time but its cool other than that
customer_reviews.text: You can barely set the time to the current time but its cool other than that.
customer_reviews.author: Aiasha

customer_reviews.title: This watch is a great gift for kids
customer_reviews.text: This watch is a great gift for kids, easy to use, it looks nice and high quality, excellent packaging. Pros: dual system, analogue and digital Fits kids wrists Night light Timer Alarm Easy to use Cons: the alarm could not be set on pm or am.
customer_reviews.author: Mhmd Shneawer

customer_reviews.title: Sons favorite christmas present
customer_reviews.text: My boys 8 and 9 yrs old were excited to receive these as gifts. I didnt think they would in this age of technology but they truly enjoy their watches. The watches are water resistant and they were excoted to wear them in the shower. These are great actvie watches for active boys. It's one gift they haven't forgot about by now ;)
customer_reviews.author: Sport317

customer_reviews.title: It is not user friendly and I do not recommend the watch
customer_reviews.text: There are no instructions on how to set this. I did find a YouTube video about setting it. However, somehow the time got changed on the watch. Now I have to find the YouTube video again, to set it. It is not user friendly and I do not recommend the watch. I am already looking for a replacement watch.
customer_reviews.author: genovese 1

customer_reviews.title: Sub par quality
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken, decided to go with a new watch altogether
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: You can move the second hand back by swinging your ...
customer_reviews.text: You can move the second hand back by swinging your arm. I'm going to try and return it. Update: The seller promptly responded and provided a fully functional replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn M. Nash
